TopicTitle: A reminder that KSP has the best community on Earth! (or Kerbin).

Articles.Content:
I have generally found this forum to be by far the friendliest, most enthusiastic and helpful group of people to ever spend hours talking about a computer game!

This was brought home today when, after recently joining the beta, I signed up for the Elite Dangerous forums... what an unpleasant nest of flamers and trolls, all ready to shoot the newcomer down for daring to ask questions about the game! (not all of them of course... but an alarming amount).

So, KSPers... remember you are a shining beacon of forum niceness, and hopefully one day other games will learn to follow in your footsteps!
Yay niceness

This is great and all but we don't need another thread that will just devolve into comparing how awesome we are to other communities. A community that needs to remind itself how awesome it is compared to other communities isn't exactly nice or great.
lol... did my post about how there is no flaming on KSP forums... just get flamed?
Don't mind regex he's always ... Grumpy
Yay niceness

Don't mind regex he's always ... Grumpy

I'll let him off, he made my Kerbol system bigger!

Yay niceness

Yay!

Seriously though, it is something to be proud of in a world of trolls that ksp is an island of niceness.
Does this mean that you're back on the forums, mulbin?
... a bit... Baby is 3 months old now so free time is starting to appear. Might even have a look at Munbug XII soon... or maybe a bit more on my simpit.
Yay for childhood independence complex developments
It is one of the better ones. I suppose any game will foster differences in playstyles, but this community is welcoming, and generally pleasant.
Aww thanks <3
Yeah this is one of the huge reasons why I love this community.
Notwithstanding someone, I totally agree with the OP. Best community here for sure of any I ever met. And that is reason to be proud to be serving here.
What about bay12 forums? I've never seen anybody insulted, and we're always helpful to newcomers.

What about bay12 forums? I've never seen anybody insulted, and we're always helpful to newcomers.

Actually the DF forums are quite chill, easily on par with these forums. I don't have an account there but I read them quite often.
Damn you! You just made me discover another game I hadn't heard of.... wife won't be happy
Oolite's another I'd better not tell you about, then... Or its forums.
I used the ROBLOX forums for a while. Everyone was so abusive, when I first saw the KSP forums I thought there must be something wrong, because everyone was so nice

I like this place too, although I have to say I will always have the softest spot in my heart for the Skyrim modding community.

lovely bunch of peeps (not saying you guys aren't ) but I was there for a looooong time and met many great people.

Oolite's another I'd better not tell you about, then... Or its forums.

Yes, oolite is great, and the forum.... which is why I was so surprised at how unfriendly the ED forum is... you'd expect the same people. I should ptobably add orbiter to the list of friendly forums.... and the arduino forums to some of the less friendly/flaming! In fact I get my arduino advice from the ksp forum as its much more help!
I think we're because all of us are going to be aiming for an intelligent atmosphere on our forums because to many newcomers it is rocket science!

The moderators do a very good job At keeping the trollzors away.

Looking at the minecraft forum or any other forum they have a lot of trolls, so far I have not seen any trolls, except the ones who lurk silently and downrate threads.

This is my favorite online community, which is why I spend so much time here.

Lots of smart people to learn interesting stuff from, often things that aren't KSP related (looking at you, Science Forum). I'm able to help new players with the stuff I've figured out. The moderators do a great job of keeping the less desirable types away or in check (thanks, mods!). There seems to be a more intelligent and cooperative atmosphere here than in any other gaming forum.

I hope it keeps going the way it has been as it grows.
if you've dooped yourself into thinking this is a great community congrats
